title: My way
creator_credit: La Trobe University and Patricia Edgar
brief_description: This film contrasts and compares the attitudes and styles of three Victorian Education Department teachers. Controversial issues are discussed openly and classroom activities provide an inside view of teaching styles.
description: This film contrasts and compares the attitudes and styles of three Victorian Education Department teachers. Controversial issues are discussed openly and classroom activities provide an inside view of teaching styles.
